snippet: Israeli leaders are again talking about possible military action to stop Iran’s nuclear ambitions. But diplomacy, not an attack, is still the best solution.
abstract: Editorial expresses concern over news that Israeli leaders are again talking about possible military action to stop Iran's nuclear ambitions; argues that intensified diplomacy from the major powers, not an attack, is still the best solution.
lead_paragraph: Israeli leaders are again talking about possible military action to stop Iran’s nuclear ambitions. But diplomacy, not an attack, is still the best solution.
